title: Late Summer Miracle -  3 Bedroom Loft on Rivington
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'Rent: $5,050 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Late Summer Miracle -  3 Bedroom Loft on Rivington', 'Do you want to live in the hottest, most coveted neighborhood in Manhattan, surrounded by the best restaurants, bars and clubs?', 'This 3 bedroom Rivington loft is waiting for you and your friends, for an Aug 1st move-in.', 'Typical of a loft-style apartment, it features super high ceilings, a light-flooded atrium, and panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline.', 'Complete with a dishwasher and washer/dryer in unit, this apartment is why you moved to NYC, to experience the best downtown NYC has to offer while living in style and comfort.', ' This light-filled duplex is perfect for entertaining or filming the life of a blossoming influencer.', "Practically across the street from Nom Wah, Thai Diner, and The Butcher's Daughter, as well as minutes away from Essex Market, Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, too many bars to keep track of, the location is a foodie's paradise.", "You'll have bragging rights over your friends for years.", 'Conveniently located just one block from the J & Z subway Bowery Station, and a short walk to the C, F, J, M lines at the Delancey stop.', "Once you nab a one-of-a-kind loft in the historic Lower East Side, you won't want give it up for years to come.", 'Even more perfect as a 2 bedroom with massive home office for a remote work set-up.', '6th floor walk-up.', 'Pictures are of a different unit on the same line in the same building.', '- Dishwasher', '- Washer/dryer combo in unit', '- Heat and hot water included', 'The Lower East Side is rich with the best dining options, historical landmarks, local boutiques and incredible nightlife.', 'Right across the river from Williamsburg, Brooklyn and a skip to New York University.', "Now encompassing a Essex Market, Whole Foods and Trader Joe's, across the Bowery to Chinatown, it rivals Chelsea as a foodie destination.", "It's easy to see why this neighborhood is the downtown epicenter of  Manhattan social scene.", 'Call, text or email Gesha-Marie to schedule a viewing @ 646-239-7412.']
